attributes.name: PromiseProxyMixin

methods.description:
An alias to the proxied promise's `then`.

See RSVP.Promise.then.
methods.name: then

methods.description:
An alias to the proxied promise's `catch`.

See RSVP.Promise.catch.
methods.name: catch

methods.description:
An alias to the proxied promise's `finally`.

See RSVP.Promise.finally.
methods.name: finally

properties.description:
If the proxied promise is rejected this will contain the reason
provided.
properties.name: reason

properties.description: Once the proxied promise has settled this will become `false`.
properties.name: isPending

properties.description: Once the proxied promise has settled this will become `true`.
properties.name: isSettled

properties.description: Will become `true` if the proxied promise is rejected.
properties.name: isRejected

properties.description: Will become `true` if the proxied promise is fulfilled.
properties.name: isFulfilled
promise
